keys: Días de fiesta alrededor del mundo
resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1052</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Festivals and Holidays Around the World</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Festivals und Feiertage um die Welt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Festivals et vacances autour du monde</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Festivals e feriados em torno do mundo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Festival e feste intorno al mondo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φεστιβάλ και διακοπές σε όλο τον κόσμο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Festivales y días de fiesta alrededor del mundo</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Each country has its own holidays and festivals. The following activities will help the learners become aware of the many holidays, festivals and traditions celebrated by different countries and different religions. They will show the learners that many of these holidays, festivals and traditions are celebrated at similar times of the year and for similar reasons.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Festivals</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Holidays Around the World</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">lesson plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Jedes Land hat seine eigenen Feiertage und 
Festivals. Die folgenden Aktivitäten helfen den Anfängern, den
vielen Feiertagen, den Festivals und den Traditionen bewußt zu 
werden, die durch unterschiedliche Länder und unterschiedliche 
Religionen gefeiert werden. Sie zeigen den Anfängern, daß 
viele dieser Feiertage, Festivals und Traditionen zu den ähnlichen 
Zeiten des Jahres und aus ähnlichen Gründen gefeiert werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Chaque pays a ses propres vacances et festivals. 
Les activités suivantes aideront les étudiants à se rendre 
compte des nombreux vacances, festivals et traditions célébrés par 
différents pays et différentes religions. Elles prouveront aux
étudiants que plusieurs de ces vacances, festivals et traditions sont
célébrées aux heures semblables de l'année et pour les raisons 
semblables.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cada país tem seus próprios feriados e 
festivals. As seguintes atividades ajudarão aos learners 
tornar-se cientes de muitos feriados, festivals e tradições 
comemorados por países diferentes e por religiões diferentes. 
Mostrarão aos learners que muitas destes feriados, festivals e 
tradições estão comemoradas em horas similares do ano e para 
razões similares.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ogni paese ha le relativi propri feste e 
festival. Le seguenti attività aiuteranno i principianti a 
diventare coscienti delle molti feste, festival e tradizioni 
celebrati dai paesi differenti e dalle religioni differenti. 
Indicheranno ai principianti che molte di questi feste, 
festival e tradizioni sono celebrate in orari uguali dell'anno e 
per i motivi simili.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κάθε χώρα έχει τις διακοπές και τα φεστιβάλ της. 
Οι ακόλουθες δραστηριότητες θα βοηθήσουν τους αρχαρίους να 
γίνουν ενήμερους για τις πολλές διακοπές, τα φεστιβάλ και τις 
παραδόσεις που γιορτάζονται από τις διαφορετικές χώρες και τις 
διαφορετικές θρησκείες. Θα εμφανίσουν στους αρχαρίους ότι 
πολλές από αυτές τις διακοπές, φεστιβάλ και παραδόσεις 
γιορτάζονται στους παρόμοιους χρόνους του έτους και για 
παρόμοιους λόγους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cada país tiene sus propios días de fiesta y 
festivales. Las actividades siguientes ayudarán a los 
principiantes a ser enterados de los muchos días de fiesta, 
festivales y tradiciones celebrados por diversos países y diversas 
religiones. Mostrarán a principiantes que muchas de estos días
de fiesta, festivales y tradiciones están celebradas en las horas 
similares del año y por razones similares.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Festivals</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Feiertage um die Welt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektionplan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Festivals</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Vacances autour du monde</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">plan de leçon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Festivals</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Feriados em torno do mundo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">planta da lição</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Festival</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Feste intorno al mondo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">programma di lezione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φεστιβάλ</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διακοπές σε όλο τον κόσμο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σχέδιο μαθήματος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Festivales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">plan de la lección</string>
          </keyword>
